title: Island Villa Retreat with Private Pool & Decadent All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Leave the hustle and bustle of city life behind and indulge on a luxury island retreat at Lelewatu Resort Sumba, an oasis on the clifftops of Sumba Island - one of Indonesia’s undiscovered gems. Relax in your own villa with a private pool and soak up emerald rainforest views or shimmering ocean vistas, feast on delicious local cuisine at the beautiful Bokosawu Restaurant and embrace the untouched beauty of Sumba Island, just a one-hour flight from Bali.

Spoil yourself with this incredible getaway that boasts all-inclusive dining (daily breakfast, three-course lunch and dinner), a daily cocktail accompanied by delicious canapés, one 60-minute massage per person, complimentary activities, daily restocked minibar, complimentary shuttle to Rua Beach and return transfers from the island's airport.

**Travelling with family or as a group?** Upgrade to a spacious two-bedroom villa featuring a large private pool and ocean views.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Jl. Lelewatu No.168, Wei Mangoma, Wanokaka, Kabupaten Sumba Barat, Nusa Tenggara Tim. 87272, Indonesia

title: Secluded Five-Star Indonesia Island Villa Retreat with Private Infinity Pool & All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Indulge on a luxury island retreat like no other at the five-star Lelewatu Resort Sumba, an oasis on the clifftop of Sumba island - one of Indonesia’s best-kept secrets. Relax in your spectacular cliff-edge villa with private infinity pool and views of the emerald rainforest and shimmering ocean, and embrace the untouched beauty of Sumba, just a one-hour flight from Bali. Reconnect with nature on this beautiful islet, where you'll discover unspoilt natural landscapes and rich Sumbanese culture. This truly is paradise found: from dips in the turquoise Weekuri Lagoon to lazing on picturesque Nihiwatu Beach and chasing Lapopu Waterfall. It's also a chance to discover an authentic side of Indonesia via guided tours through Sumba's traditional villages and the intricate design of its 'ikat' cloth, which you can watch being made, spot throughout the resort or even purchase to take home.

Let Lelewatu Resort Sumba be your serene oasis on the island, with a magnificent clifftop setting and unparalleled views over the Indian Ocean. With direct access to a pristine beach and beautiful lagoon, delicious local cuisine at Bokosawu Restaurant, a blissful spa to help you rejuvenate body and soul, and a long list of resort activities to immerse yourself in the island’s culture, there's no better spot on Sumba.
offer_address: Jl. Lelewatu No.168, Wei Mangoma, Wanokaka, Kabupaten Sumba Barat, Nusa Tenggara Tim. 87272, Indonesia

title: Rugged Sumba Luxury with Beachfront Dining, Open-Air Spa & Equestrian Centre
description:
Discover where secluded island luxury meets tropical forest and rugged coastline at this exclusive villa-only estate on the untouched Indonesian island of Sumba. Recruit friends and family to escape to the uniquely designed villas for up to four or six guests, making new memories by your private pool or with the raft of unique experiences on offer: swim with horses, catch a wave at world-class breaks, soak up incredible sunsets, or dine at the sandy-floored, open-air Ombak Restaurant.

For some pampering bliss, indulge your senses at the NIHI Spa Safari with well-curated detox programmes featuring cliffside yoga and restorative massages. If you want to rustle things up in the kitchen, get busy with an Indonesian or Japanese cooking class or whip up great drinks in a mixology class - there is plenty to do on this island escape!
offer_address: Hoba Wawi, Wanokaka, West Sumba Regency, East Nusa Tenggara 87272, Indonesia

title: Indonesia Eco-Luxury Sumba Island Boutique Beachfront Retreat
description: Absolute serenity, natural elegance, and island eco-luxury are the foundations of Indonesia’s boutique Cap Karoso - perched on the unspoilt western shores of Sumba Island. Discover the island's culture and villages on a Sumba tour and surf the world-renowned breaks. Julang restaurant, run by guest chefs, serves French-inspired fine dining, while the Beach Club offers a laidback approach to seaside eating with casual Mediterranean-meets-Indonesian ingredients.
offer_address: Pantai Karoso, Ate Dalo, Kec. Kodi, Kabupaten Sumba Barat Daya, Nusa Tenggara Timur, 87261, Indonesia

title: Indonesia Sumba Island Beachfront Hideaway with Shoreside Bar, Infinity Pools and World-Class Surfing
description: Escape to the largely untouched island of Sumba and discover The Sanubari - pure coastal luxury blended with stunning natural beauty and contemporary touches Boasting incredible views of the pristine white sand beach and lush surrounds, relax and take the view in from the infinity pool or with a cocktail in hand at the beachfront bar. Ideal for surfing enthusiasts, the beach is world-class and uncrowded, and the Sumbanese swimming horses are amazing at sunset.
offer_address: Pantai Dasang, Harona Kala, Laboya Barat, West Sumba Regency, East Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia
